price: O descendants of those whom We carried [on board] with Noah[2]. He was indeed a grateful slave.”
arabic: ذُرِّيَّةَ مَنۡ حَمَلۡنَا مَعَ نُوحٍۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَبۡدٗا شَكُورٗا
footnotes: [2] The Children of Israel are given the reference of Prophet Noah (عليه السلام); to follow him for being dutiful and thankful to Allah.

meta.transliteration: dhurriyyata man ḥamalnā maʿa nūḥin innahu kāna ʿabdan shakūran
